meanings.definition: Organisms that can live and grow in the absence of oxygen.
meanings.sent1: Anaerobes are tiny living things that thrive without oxygen.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study anaerobes to understand life without oxygen.
meanings.sent3: The anaerobes had a party in the oxygen-free zone.
meanings.sent4: In the dark depths of the ocean, anaerobes reign supreme.
meanings.sent5: Anaerobes are like oxygen-free warriors, conquering their environment.

meanings.definition: Bacteria that do not require oxygen for growth.
meanings.sent1: Some anaerobes are bacteria that grow without needing oxygen.
meanings.sent2: Doctors use antibiotics to fight harmful anaerobes in the body.
meanings.sent3: The anaerobes played hide and seek with the oxygen molecules.
meanings.sent4: In the absence of oxygen, anaerobes flourish like tiny rebels.
meanings.sent5: Anaerobes are like bacteria ninjas, thriving in the shadows without oxygen.

meanings.definition: Microorganisms that can survive in environments lacking oxygen.
meanings.sent1: Microorganisms known as anaerobes can survive in oxygen-deprived places.
meanings.sent2: Anaerobes in swamps help break down organic matter without oxygen.
meanings.sent3: The anaerobes had a picnic in the no-oxygen zone.
meanings.sent4: In the depths of the soil, anaerobes quietly carry out their tasks.
meanings.sent5: Anaerobes are like tiny survivors, adapting to oxygen-free habitats.
